entity.name: Labour set to announce new party leader

text: @Keir_Starmer @Keir_Starmer Please, as one of your first jobs, can you question why people with active #coronavirus infection are permitted to #exercise, without any added protection, with those who are uninfected? Here's the #nhs link: https://t.co/2oMpGrvN9L
